}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm]] QCN9074 • Mini PCIe Wi-Fi 6E Radio Module *Mini PCIe interface with PCIe 3.0 ([[Compex PN02.7]] RD) *4x spatial streams (4SS) Multi-user MIMO (MU-MIMO) *Frequency Range: 6.150 ~ 7.125GHz (US Version), :5.945 ~ 6.425GHz (EU Version), up to 4804Mbps *3.3V operating voltage, 4x U.FL antenna connectors
==See also== ===Models=== :;[[Compex]] • [https://compex.com.sg/wifi-module/ Wi-Fi 6 Module] *[[Compex PN01.1]] • QCN9024 • QCN6024/9024/9074, 4×4 2.4GHz *[[Compex PN02.1]] • QCN9074 • QCN6024/9024/9074, 4×4 5GHz *[[Compex PN02.7]] • QCN9074 • QCN6024/9024/9074, 4×4 6GHz *[[Compex WLE3000H2]] • QCN9024 • QCN6024/9024/9074, 4×4 2.4GHz *[[Compex WLE3000H5]] • QCN9074 • QCN6024/9024/9074, 4×4 5GHz *[[Compex WLE3000H6]] • QCN9074 • QCN6024/9024/9074, 4×4 6GHz
*[[Compex WLE3000H56]] • QCN9024/9074, 4×4 5/6GHz WiFi 6E *[[Compex WLW3000H6]] • QCN9024/9074, 4×4 6GHz WiFi 6E *[[Compex WLE3000HX]] • QCN6024/9024/9074, 4×4 2.4/5GHz WiFi 6 *[[Compex WLE3002HX]] • QCN6024/9024/9074, 2×2 2.4/5GHz WiFi 6
*[[Compex WLT206H]] • QCA2062/2066, ‘Verona’, 2×2 2.4/5GHz + BT 5.1 BLE *[[Compex WLT639]] • QCA6391, 'Hastings', 2×2 2.4/5GHz WiFi 6 *[[Compex WLT674]] • QCA6174, 'Rome', 2×2 2.4/5GHz WiFi 6
